application.doc: Retrieving all configuration entries for a stanza - Runtime Environment

param.name: resource_id
param.doc: Name of the configuration file to export. For example, ldap.conf, pd.conf, instance.conf

param.name: stanza_id
param.doc: The name of the resource stanza entry. For example, "server". Note: This name cannot contain the string "/entry_name" unless it is the start of the stanza name. ie "/entry_name/name" is valid but "/name/entry_name" is not.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve all configuration entries for a stanza
method.doc: To retrieve all configuration parameters for a stanza with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the configuration entry management URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: entryName
param.doc: entry name and value in the format of key value pairs, which repeat dynamically according to set of results returned.
